summary: This bill, the Creating Opportunities for New Skills Training at Rural or Underserved Colleges and Trade Schools Act of 2025 (CONSTRUCTS Act), amends the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to provide grants to junior/community colleges and trade schools. The grants aim to expand their capacity to offer training, education, and outreach for careers in the residential construction industry. Key aspects include defining terms, outlining eligible entities, application requirements, funding usage, and reporting. The bill prioritizes serving rural areas and underserved populations and includes provisions for flexible scheduling and supportive services.
